```latex
If a particle of mass \( m \) collides elastically with one of mass \( M \) at rest, and if the former is scattered at an angle \( \theta \) and the latter recoils at an angle \( \phi \) with respect to the line of motion of the incident particle, then show that

\[
\frac{m}{M} = \frac{\sin(2\phi + \theta)}{\sin \theta}.
\]
```
